description: Number of unitary prime divisors of central binomial coefficient C(n, floor(n/2)) (A001405).
formula: A prime divisor is unitary iff its exponent equals 1.
example: n=10: binomial[10,5]=252=2.2.3.3.7 has 3 prime factors of which only 1,p=7 is unitary. So a(10)=1.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 27 2000
